cppcoreguidelines-avoid-magic-numbers.description:
Description

The
cppcoreguidelines-avoid-magic-numbers
check is an alias, please see
readability-magic-numbers
for more information.
cppcoreguidelines-avoid-magic-numbers.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
